law.catch_line: Application of KRS 260.775 to 260.845 -- Unlicensed person not to transact business with permitted producer.

text.section: The requirements and prohibitions of KRS 260.775 to 260.845 shall not apply to persons who buy milk for their own consumption.
It is unlawful for any person who is not licensed under KRS 260.775 to 260.845 to transact business with a permitted producer of this state.

law.history: Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 229, sec. 2, effective January 1, 2001.
